mapper.select: select /*+ customer.list */ cust_ymd, cust_no, mem_id, cust_name, cust_sex, cust_phone1, cust_phone2, cust_phone3, cust_etc, cust_reg_date, cust_upd_date FROM hair_customer where mem_id like '%'||#{mem_id}||'%' order by cust_upd_date desc, cust_no desc
select /*+ customer.listCnt */ count(*) cnt FROM hair_customer where mem_id like '%'||#{mem_id}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into /*+ customer.write */ hair_customer ( cust_ymd, cust_no, mem_id, cust_name, cust_sex, cust_phone1, cust_phone2, cust_phone3, cust_etc, cust_reg_date, cust_upd_date ) value ( DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') ,(select a.cust_no from(select IFNULL(MAX(cust_no) + 1, 1) cust_no from hair_customer) a ) ,#{mem_id} , #{cust_name} , #{cust_sex} , #{cust_phone1} , #{cust_phone2} , #{cust_phone3} , #{cust_etc} , now() , now() )
